fields.name: Creeping Numbness (Cost 30%/15%):
fields.value: Target a player during the Day. They will be penalized 10% score the next Evening, and if their score is below 40%, they will be roleblocked the next Night.

fields.name: Brain Freeze:
fields.value: Target a player during the Evening, before results, that you have placed above at least once. If their role would cause them to receive a list of potential targets, they receive two fewer than they would at the end of this Evening.

fields.name: Hypothermia (Passive):
fields.value: Every Evening, you may choose as many non-Mage-aligned players who are in Hello Neighbors with Mage-aligned players as you wish. All selected players will be penalized 5% score.
